name: UPRIZING
description:
Uprizing is an animated first-person and third-person Zombie Co-op Shooter game that's currently in early development (Pre-Alpha).  The current features available to play is the Singleplayer survival mode. More Features are yet to come in future updates. Any feedback or support (https://streamlabs.com/triniberry/tip) is greatly appreciated.  Hope you Enjoy the Game!

Mode : Single-player

Platforms: Pc (Windows 64 bit)

Developer: TriniBerry Productions

Designer: Triniberry Productions

Engine: Unreal 4


Controls

◽WASD to Move Around in game

◽ Mouse to look about

◽ Right Mouse Button to Aim ( while aiming press B to ADS )

◽ Left Mouse Button to Shoot and Melee(But only when no weapons are in hand.)

◽ Space to Jump

◽ E to interact with objects

◽Left Alt to crouch

◽ Left Shift to Sprint

◽ G to use throwable

◽ 1 to Equip Primary

◽ 2 to Equip Secondary

◽ 4 to Use Consumable

◽ R to Reload

◽ TAB to view current score

◽ Escape To Pause Game
